question: Which country houses the "Kamarang Great Falls"?
explanation: Kamarang Great Falls is located on the Kamarang River in southwestern Guyana. The falls plunge off the Pacaraima Mountains escarpment in an isolated western corner of Guyana only a few kilometres from the Venezuelan border. Its height is 145 meters. By its volume, Kamarang Great Falls is one of the most powerful waterfalls in the country.
